events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further processing by our hiring team.
A recruiter has been assigned to your profile and will be reaching out to you to schedule the next steps.
Your initial screening interview was completed successfully with positive feedback from the hiring manager.
Thank you for your prompt response to our interview scheduling request; it helps us continue smoothly.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10 AM UTC. Please be prepared with coding challenges.
The technical interview was completed and the interviewers provided strong positive feedback on your skills.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th, where we will discuss cultural fit and company values.
You have successfully completed the HR interview with positive feedback regarding your alignment with our team.
We are pleased to offer you the Software Engineer position at our company. Please review the offer documents.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer. We hope you find the terms satisfactory and look forward to your decision.
We have received your acceptance of the job offer and are excited to welcome you aboard as a new Software Engineer.
Your onboarding process has officially started. We have sent you orientation materials and access credentials.
This recruitment process is now closed as you have joined our engineering team. Welcome and best wishes ahead!
